entry.title: Russian Buildup Near Ukraine Features Potent Weapons Systems, Well-Trained Troops
entry.content: The more than 130,000 troops Moscow has in the region are still too few to seize and occupy the whole of Ukraine, according to U.S. assessments. However, the deployments provide Russiaâ€™s commanders formidable advantages.

entry.title: India's Economy Hinges on the Return of Workers Who Fled to Their Villages
entry.content: Economists say the nation must create tens of millions of jobs that bring migrant workers out of farming or risk a decade of arrested growth. Many workers who returned home to rural areas say they plan to stay.
